Verifies that receiving a set-cookie header where the name + value size exceeds the max size causes a Network.ResponseReceivedExtraInfo event to be sent containing the correct blocked cookie reason.

Invalid name/value pair size blocked set-cookies:[
    [0] : {
        blockedReasons : [
            [0] : NameValuePairExceedsMaxSize
        ]
        cookieLine : 
    }
]
